location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing orders from the King of Persia to the Government at Shiraz to return property plundered in Bushire and requesting that the Resident informs the Governor General of India if the request is not complied with.
